text: Pierre Lang (born June 13, 1947 in Creutzwald) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Moselle department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:People from Creutzwald Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Pierre Lang
